clip.quote: Focus on what you do have, not on what you don't.
clip.why_clipworthy: This quote emphasizes a positive mindset that can help agents overcome rejection.
clip.suggested_hook: Are you focusing on the wrong things in your real estate career?

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Are you focusing on the wrong things in your real estate career?",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Bari Mill, a seasoned real estate expert who knows the power of mindset. In a challenging industry, your focus can make or break you.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Bari shares, 'Focus on what you do have, not on what you don't.' This mindset shift helps agents overcome rejection by leveraging their strengths and resources.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) By concentrating on your existing assets, you can build resilience and find creative solutions. Apply this to transform setbacks into opportunities.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to shift your focus? Start listing your strengths today and see how they can propel your business forward."
  },
  "CAPTION": "Shift your focus to what you have, not what you lack. #MindsetMatters",

}
```

clip.quote: CRM is something that is not that hard, and if I just set an alarm or a timer to input clients for 10 minutes a day, it's not that hard.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of consistent CRM use for business growth.
clip.suggested_hook: Is your CRM helping or hurting your business?

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Is your CRM helping or hurting your business? Discover the simple trick to make it work for you!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Bari Mill, a real estate expert who knows the power of mindset and motivation. Learn why CRM consistency is key.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) Bari shares, 'CRM is something that is not that hard, and if I just set an alarm or a timer to input clients for 10 minutes a day, it's not that hard.' This simple habit can transform your business.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) Consistent CRM use leads to growth. Apply this tactic daily to build stronger client relationships and boost your real estate success.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to see results? Set your timer today and share your progress with us! How will you make CRM work for you?"
  },
  "caption": "Is your CRM a tool for growth or a missed opportunity? Discover the 10-minute daily habit that can transform your business.",
  "hashtags": ["#RealEstateTips", "#CRMStrategy", "#BusinessGrowth", "#RealEstateMindset", "#Networking"],
  "content_pillar": "systems_that_scale"
}
```
